name: JavaScriptAnalyzer
featuresDescription: All basic standard analyses supported (source code overview, duplication, file size, cross-cutting concerns, findings, metrics, controls)
Advanced code cleaning (empty lines and comments removed for LOC calculations, additional cleaning for duplication calculations)
Basic heuristic dependency analysis (based on imports and require statements)
